entry.title: Sunny-117/cherry: ✨ A lightweight JavaScript packaging library based on magic-string and acorn, supporting tree-shaking 它是一个轻量级且高效的JavaScript打包器，专为快速构建和打包现代web应用程序而设计。Cherry凭借其简单而强大的工作流程，致力于提供最佳的性能和开发体验。

entry.title: randajan/cs-inflect: A lightweight JavaScript library for declension of Czech numerals and nouns based on numbers, supporting singular, paucal (2–4), and genitive plural forms. Perfect for formatting grammatically correct strings in Czech.

entry.title: naitikraj1000/Simple-Portfolio-Tracker: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.
entry.content: A lightweight and easy-to-use application to track your investments and portfolio performance. This tool allows you to manage assets, monitor profits/losses, and analyze holdings efficiently. Perfect for personal use or small-scale portfolio management.

entry.content: Lightweight, intuitive SaaS email client designed for professionals to manage their emails efficiently

entry.title: krozamdev/masked-password: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
entry.content: A lightweight and modern utility to mask input fields with password-like characters. This library is specifically designed to prevent password managers from automatically saving values, making it ideal for sensitive data handling. It also provides a method to retrieve the original value of the input. Fully compatible with JavaScript and TypeScript.
